Title: Bull Chicken Membership
Description: The Bull Chicken members get a lifetime discount on all their purchases, as well as access to exclusive products in our menu.
phase_3: Meetups, merch, and member of the month launch
faq_a1: Bull Chicken NFTs is a utility driven NFT collection with rewards
faq_a2: We wish to give our most loyal customers exclusive access to our products and discounts.
faq_q4: What can I do with the NFT
faq_a4: You will get a lifetime discount for as long as you hold the NFT, as well as access to our exclusive burger.
faq_q5: What is the price & other costs
faq_a5: Our whitelist price will be -- and our public price will be --.
faq_a6: After launch, we will roll out the membership perks one per month.
